abstract: This is a book review of Dan Immergluck, FORECLOSED:  HIGH-RISK LENDING, DEREGULATION, AND THE UNDERMINING OF AMERICAS MORTGAGE MARKET (Cornell University Press 2009).
title: Book Review:  Dan Immergluck, FORECLOSED:  HIGH-RISK LENDING, DEREGULATION, AND THE UNDERMINING OF AMERICAS MORTGAGE MARKET
subject: law
